title: Ep 3: DigiNotar, You are the Weakest Link, Good Bye!
description: The 2011 DigiNotar breach changed the way browsers do security. In this episode, we learn what role a CA plays, how browsers work with CAs, and what happens when a CA is breached.
itunes:title: DigiNotar, You are the Weakest Link, Good Bye!
itunes:author: Jack Rhysider
itunes:subtitle: The 2011 DigiNotar breach changed the way browsers do security. In this episode, we learn what role a CA plays, how browsers work with CAs, and what happens when a CA is breached.
